mapper.select:
select count(id) from delivery_point where
user_id = #{user_id} and
point_name = #{point_name} and
address = #{address} and
longitude = #{longitude} and
latitude = #{latitude} and
contact = #{contact} and
province_id = #{province_id} and
city_id = #{city_id} and
district_id = #{district_id} and
province = #{province} and
city = #{city} and
district = #{district} and
1=1

SELECT dp.*, ui.nick_name, ui.real_name FROM delivery_point dp LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON dp.user_id = ui.id where 1=1
and dp.id = #{id}
